name: The Three Charms
description:
★ Fairy tales come to "reverse"!★

An escape simulation RPG based on the folk tale "Three Bills"!

Use your legs and mysterious bills to escape from the temptations of youkai girls!

If you manage to escape until the end while maintaining your stamina, you win!
But if you let your guard down and catch up...

The demon's weapon is a color scheme!
It uses sweet words, sorcery, and its own charm to deceive your mind.
Use that familiar item to seal their magic!

This work is written in English.
This work overlaps in content with "Three Gifts (RE199731)".
